verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H559>time,<s%> saying,
<S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> that <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H7121>preach<s%> to it the <S%H7150>message<s%> that I give <S%H1696>you.<s%>"

So <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Now <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> was an <S%H430>exceedingly<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>' journey <S%H4109>across.<s%>

<S%H3124>He<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H4109>journey,<s%> and he <S%H7121>cried<s%> <S%H559>out,<s%> and said, "In <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> will be <S%H2015>overthrown!<s%>"

The <S%H582>people<s%> of <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> <S%H539>believed<s%> <S%H430>God;<s%> and they <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> a <S%H6685>fast,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> from their <S%H1419>greatest<s%> even to their <S%H6996>least.<s%>

The <S%H1697>news<s%> <S%H5060>reached<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> and he <S%H6965>arose<s%> from his <S%H3678>throne,<s%> and took <S%H5674>off<s%> his royal <S%H155>robe,<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> himself with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> in <S%H665>ashes.<s%>

He made a <S%H2199>proclamation<s%> and <S%H559>published<s%> through <S%H5210>Nineveh<s%> by the <S%H2940>decree<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> and his <S%H1419>nobles,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Let neither <S%H120>man<s%> nor <S%H929>animal,<s%> <S%H1241>herd<s%> nor <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H2938>taste<s%> <S%H3972>anything;<s%> let them not <S%H7462>feed,<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water;<s%>

but let them be <S%H3680>covered<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> both <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>animal,<s%> and let them <S%H7121>cry<s%> <S%H2394>mightily<s%> to <S%H430>God.<s%> <S%H7725>Yes,<s%> let them turn <S%H376>everyone<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and from the <S%H2555>violence<s%> that is in his <S%H3709>hands.<s%>

Who <S%H3045>knows<s%> whether <S%H430>God<s%> will not <S%H7725>turn<s%> and <S%H7725>relent,<s%> and turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger,<s%> so that we might not <S%H6>perish?<s%>"

<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> their <S%H4639>works,<s%> that they <S%H7725>turned<s%> from their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5162>relented<s%> of the <S%H7451>disaster<s%> which he <S%H1696>said<s%> he would <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H6213>them,<s%> and he didn't do it.
